name: get_lexical_field
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dicolink.
Tool description: Dicolink API lets you retrieve information about French words, including definitions, synonyms, antonyms, quotes, expressions, lexical field, scrabble score, and much more...
API description: Retrieves the lexical field for a given word using the Dicolink API.

mot.description: The word for which the lexical field is to be retrieved.

limite.description: The limit on the number of results to be retrieved (default is '20').
